com.beepell.variable
Class Variable

java.lang.Object
  com.beepell.variable.Variable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComplexTypeVariable, ElementVariable, MessageVariable, SimpleTypeVariable
public abstract class Variable
extends Object

Abstract super class for Variables.

public QName getType()
Gets the variable type. For element variables, this is the namespace URI and local name.

validate

public abstract void validate()
                       throws InvalidVariables,
                              UninitializedVariable
Validates the variable against its type.

Throws:
InvalidVariables - if the variable value does not validate against its type.
UninitializedVariable - if the variable is not initilized.
